archimate:Capability.name: Calculation Engine
archimate:Capability.documentation:
We use calculation engine(s) to carry out specific summations for internal and regulatory purposes. Supportive Content can also be used to describe the specific requirements of financial or environmental calculations (sustainability).
Therefore, these calculations are not performed by the data platform itself, but by the engines, which carries out the calculations. The supportive content terms provide a mechanism to identify the data elements that are required as input and output for those calculations.
